WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is fixed in a future release of TypeScript.
WorkItem.Description:
Hi, [according to closed issue #716](https://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/716) invoking the "Clean" command on a project should remove all compiler generated files.

This does not yet happen as of 0.9.5.

I tried this both with the "Combine JavaScript output into file" and "Redirect JavaScript output to directory" options checked and unchecked. The "Clean" command fails to work in any of the cases.
WorkItem.Summary: Cleaning a project does not remove compiler generated files - 2

Comments.Message: Thanks for reporting, we're taking a look.
